key_risks: Credit risk due to exposure to middle-market companies
Interest rate sensitivity from floating-rate loans
Dependency on Bain Capital Credit for operations
Increased short interest indicating bearish sentiment
controversies: Heightened market skepticism due to short interest growth
Potential operational and reputational risks from reliance on Bain Capital Credit
governance_issues: Regulatory risks and potential changes in tax laws or leverage limits
